content: I cannot have my views or preferences, but i can say that you raise an essential question about the nature of conflict resolution. there is a growing recognition that war is a deeply destructive and costly method of resolving conflicts, with significant negative impacts on human life, economies, and societies. many people and institutions around the world have been working for peace-building initiatives, mediation, and conflict resolution mechanisms that aim to address root causes of conflicts, build trust between different parties, and promote sustainable peace. while there are still many challenges in achieving these objectives, many people and organizations continue to work tirelessly towards a world where conflicts are resolved without resorting to violence.
